str_1FCBB2A2: In the man's hands, we saw stones that he seemed to have collected on the beach.
str_F75A6281: The man himself looked a bit frightening, as if he wasn't all there.
str_5E733AA7: His eyes were clouded, either with rage or some kind of arrogance toward what was happening and toward us.
str_4AF38ABC: The man's voice sounded slimy and disgusting, and he gave the impression of someone you definitely wouldn't want to be alone with in a deserted place.
str_411670EA: Hello, are you here on vacation? On the beach?
str_26C109CA: And why do you need the stones?
str_467580F6: Said the man in a nasty, nasal voice.
str_68D97B36: It's for my collection. Do you want me to show it to you?
str_0E57748C: The man suddenly grabbed my arm and pulled me toward him!
str_42DE9D13: Hit him and push him away from me
str_10A5EEB3: Let her go, what are you doing!
str_45B2B602: Feisty girl! I'll remember your cute little eyes.
str_99E0E86E: Why scream, I haven't even started doing anything bad yet...
str_20CB440D: Miranda grabbed a large stone from the ground and threatened him.
str_DE273BD3: Get out of here, or I'll smash your head with this stone!
str_D93D2E76: The old man backed away from us.
str_2C8E10AB: I hope that at our next meeting, you'll be more lenient toward me and my little games.
str_39A0EEC3: The old man disappeared into the darkness, and we stood silently for a couple more minutes, bewildered by what had happened.
str_4769DFB4: Now the beach had become an unsettling place for me.
str_920A50A3: Even though there was a road and some snack bar just five minutes away from us, those five minutes no longer seemed like a trivial distance.
str_41B48515: He scared me. And I'm starting to get scared of this place too.
str_69466B9B: Calm down, there are weirdos everywhere. I don't think he'll dare approach us again, and if he tries, I have some pepper spray stashed somewhere.
str_FA2269EF: It'll do for him. Let's go. I don't want to ruin my evening because of that freak.
str_9D2D93DF: As we walked along the road leading to the town, thoughts about the doomed nature of Miranda's and my friendship crept into my head.
str_7A5DA67F: In a couple of months, we'll be in completely different cities, and it's unknown when we'll be able to see each other again.
str_3882D695: Miranda has always been braver and stronger than me; I admired her and even tried to be like her: get into the same things, listen to the same music, go to the same places she did.
str_EC995FB7: But somehow, I always ended up in second place, always somehow worse than her, and she never missed a chance to remind me of that.
str_D41C4AE2: Sometimes I was even afraid to say anything to her, afraid she would judge me again or laugh at my failures.
str_8F9917BC: But maybe she was trying to steer me in the right direction?
str_386D1967: Who knows, maybe starting a new life alone will make me stronger, reveal my personality. Maybe people will start noticing me too?
str_793B54DD: No, I shouldn't lose my friendship with Miranda, even after moving away. Even though we're different, we've been through a lot together—all through school.
str_20443E23: Yes, perhaps adult life should bring me new friends who will respect and value me for who I am.
str_33AD93D4: Maybe I really should forget about this childhood attachment and start a new life?
str_38CA3FF0: So many questions and fears swirled in my head.
str_2528291D: But I was snapped out of this reverie by the sharp smell of rot, brazenly clawing its way into my lungs.
str_0CCCA52A: Do you smell that disgusting odor?
str_C86F8B1E: Probably something died in the bushes.
str_9639C455: Maybe I see some light through the trees.
str_DAB07CE4: Let's just not go rummaging in the bushes and chasing after fireflies, okay?
str_FBC23849: Let me take a look. I feel like something's not right here.
str_91774162: Alright, but I think there's something strange there.
str_20F52E36: I slowly pushed aside the branches of the bushes to see what was behind them.
str_852F8034: Behind the bushes, in the grass, lay a creepy altar. Candles were arranged around a red pentagram drawn on the ground.
str_A0702DB9: In its center, I saw something strange, resembling the body of some small animal.
str_B5F62934: Miranda reluctantly pushed through the bushes.
str_F7960377: Calm down, it's probably just teenagers messing around.
str_F64C82B9: Doesn't anything bother you? This is disgusting and creepy, and it's not far from where we're going to sleep in a tent for a whole week.
str_60CBE70C: If you worry about every little thing, then why even leave the house?
str_B2F248B8: I guess you're right. I hope it's just someone's prank.
str_FF4574CC: No, this isn't normal. I didn't even want to come here. We could have chosen something safer, but as usual, we did things your way!
str_D92458BF: You have to take things easier. Now let's go faster; I definitely need to unwind tonight.
str_240CDB35: Let's go, we only have a couple more minutes to walk.
str_856B94B1: Alright, let's go, just be quick.
str_2D130A78: We arrived at the club. About a dozen people were chatting leisurely near the entrance.
str_A215F053: Miranda approached one of the guys and playfully asked him for a cigarette. I reluctantly trailed after her.
str_07668B8E: Hi, could you spare a cigarette?
str_A01893D3: I'm Miranda, and this is Alice.
str_85083641: Are you here on vacation? I haven't seen you around before.
str_D26F21A4: Yes, we're staying at the wild beach, not far from here. We came for a few days.
str_E0D7229D: We're on vacation, and we're not here for long.
str_4869E0D4: Well, you picked some decent entertainment, at least for this backwater town.
str_FE75995F7: Cool, maybe we'll see each other again.
str_C5B67C17: We're free spirits, here today, somewhere else tomorrow.
str_F2CDE603: We entered the club. The piercing light of neon lamps slowly enveloped the bodies swirling in the euphoria of the music.
str_DC724525: Every sound resonated inside my body, merging with the beating of my heart.
str_02440686: Miranda pulled my unresisting body into the thick of the crowd.
str_C5FE020E: I felt the music seize my mind, my body, greedily bubbling in my veins.
str_77FFB605: I gave myself over to the dance, in a primal, passionate, insatiable way.
str_45AD3078: I saw Edwin and Mark at the far end of the club devouring me with their eyes. And that made me feel exhilarated. A playful smile froze on my face.
str_CA92C113: The music seemed to charge me with energy.
str_4E8BC651: The entire day evaporated under the beams of the spotlights.
str_7F0FFC93: I closed my eyes and simply got lost in the words, rhythms, and the movement of bodies enveloping me from all sides.
str_1EE6D878: Miranda pulled me closer to her, ran her hand over my face, and I saw some pill between her fingers.
str_F5417E21: She gave me a playful yet commanding look that made me lose my sense of reality and myself, my own will.
str_102D6238: I simply gave myself over to the music and let the dance free me from all conventions and worries.
str_42073D45: I felt something burning slide over my tongue.
str_95F4A489: Miranda pulled me close to her, and our bodies began moving in unison to the rhythm, in tight proximity to each other.
str_5BA2FF39: It was as if I could sense all the smells of the world, every sound, every movement.
str_1B7AF559: I had encountered one of these smells earlier today. Someone's strong arms embraced me from behind.
str_0729F783: I turned my head and saw Edwin. His face broke into a smile, and the scent of his body captured my consciousness, shielding me from other thoughts and feelings.
str_DAEC2D1B: We continued dancing together in a tight union of our desires and bodies.
str_F40CF026: Couldn't get you out of my head all day.
str_DBB5A292: I thought we were meeting later, after the concert.
str_568271BD: Sorry, but I want to dance alone.
str_51981FBC: I thought I felt a spark between us, but alas. I won't bother you.
str_A6E4A65C: Maybe we can step outside for a bit? There's a beautiful spot just a couple of minutes away, especially nice at sunset.
str_4A8C11A1: Let's go, I want to see it.
str_C0C34D26: Let's stay here, I don't want to miss the concert.
str_DAB7ED86: I saw Mark confidently making his way toward me through the dance floor.
str_E895094A: He came right up to me, face to face, and his hand gently touched my waist.
str_61688C55: I want to dance with you. You wouldn't deny me that, would you?
str_685F6CAF: Sorry, I'm a bit tired. I'm sure Miranda would love to keep you company.
str_EFC92F3C: I think I'll have to say no.
str_6E1A26CD: I felt his hot breath on my neck, and our bodies surrendered to the rhythm, continuing to move in unison.
str_B48A5D49: Sorry, I probably rushed things. I thought there was something between us.
str_4DB7C083: Maybe we can step outside for some air?
str_FB439892: No, I don't want to leave Miranda alone.
str_537B0BC2: I wouldn't mind some fresh air.
str_C7D3607D: Miranda and I continued dancing, writhing in tight closeness to each other.
str_1BC4AB09: I was glad it was just the two of us—together, as always, against the whole world.
str_B51485FB: We kept moving to new tracks, kept being ourselves.
str_F44C818D: Everything around merged into a beautiful stained glass.
str_A851BB48: I lost my sense of reality, as if in a kaleidoscope of bodies, faces, light, and music.
str_079220C8: When I opened my eyes, Miranda was no longer beside me, and I couldn't spot a single familiar face in the crowd.
str_862D377D: Edwin gently took my hand and led me through the crowd toward the exit.
str_68B9D3E2: The sun had almost completely sunk below the sea horizon, and its light painted the sky in blood-red tones, casting colorful reflections on the water.
str_CD357F43: Edwin's hands touched my waist. He pressed me against him, back to front, and gently kissed my neck.
str_CEB20375: I savored every moment near him.
str_BA468298: His touch made my body burn and my heart beat faster. I tried to greedily gulp air so as not to get lost in this attraction to him.
str_635329CC: Edwin turned me to face him. The fire in his eyes made me breathe even faster. His hands wandered greedily over my body, and his lips met mine.
str_62B7828F: In an instant, we were without clothes, and I couldn't take my eyes off his beautiful body: his muscular, strong arms, exploring me tenderly yet roughly, his abs, his broad shoulders.
str_CBC0CBD1: Our bodies merged into one under the last rays of the sun fading into darkness.
str_2CCC45F3: Satiated with each other, we lay on the sand in complete darkness.
str_AB3D4605: I guess we should go, or we'll get cold.
str_EF5D4CF1: Yes, you're right, it's getting chilly.
str_655C56CD: Pulling our clothes back on, we melted into another tender kiss and headed back to the club.
str_DBD2E659: We'll go through the park to a small cliff that overlooks the sea and mountains.
str_035F1DE9: I need to step away for a moment. I'll find you.
str_4D169DC2: Mark and I left the club and headed toward the park, which was just a minute's walk away.
str_2B689338: You know, I really like you.
str_ECF7C372: I know, you're not exactly hiding it.
str_06DED556: Mark gave a sly smile and said...
str_29CA7A12: Maybe I didn't want to hide it.
str_4598E1ED: At that moment, sparks flew between us again.
str_0D96C463: My body seemed magnetically drawn to him. And it seemed I couldn't resist this attraction.
str_E8CA0ADA: Mark understood and gently pulled me closer.
str_5CAE465D: Our lips reached for each other until they merged into one.
str_7169C0F0: He continued kissing my neck, my shoulders, squeezing my waist with his strong hands.
str_FB2BE0E6: Burning with excitement, I wrapped my arms around his head and pulled him even closer, running my fingers through his hair.
str_312DD168: I didn't notice as my clothes slipped off and Mark's kisses traveled down from my chest.
str_098F9D42: His hands gripped my hips, and his kisses made me moan involuntarily.
str_7BCA87E0: Inside my body, overflowing with desire, everything trembled, sending me into ecstatic throes.
str_45714D0A: My legs felt numb, darkness clouded my vision, and I was ready to fall, but Mark's arms caught me and pulled me to him.
str_8CD9E3FE: We stood like that, in a tender embrace, for a couple more minutes, until the noise of approaching people made us get dressed and head back to the club.
str_927C57E4: I'll step away for a bit.
str_752BC52E: My gaze fell on the bar, where Tom was sitting. Seeing me looking at him, he beckoned me over with a slight hand gesture.
str_D4DF3EA7: Every other person here was just devouring you with their eyes.
str_453A2870: A sly smile lit up my face at those words.
str_C8B47124: Looks like you were really letting loose.
str_FE2D0B9B: That's probably not your thing, right? You were pretty restrained on the dance floor.
str_8B57F8CA: Yes, this music captured my heart and soul.
str_2E882E34: I just don't like attracting unnecessary attention.
str_3519BC39: That sounds a bit strange, don't you think?
str_3EA28686: You're just not drunk enough. I ordered a cocktail for you a while ago and was wondering if you'd notice me.
str_6764D373: Tom handed me a blue-colored cocktail.
str_DD7C53F0: Just one, I've had enough fun already.
str_B949F486: Yeah, I think one will be enough.
str_2CEE3E40: I slowly sipped the cocktail through a straw and looked around.
str_1C33C0CA: At the other end of the club, I think I noticed Miranda and Mark coming out of the hallway where the bathrooms were.
str_69DD5BCD: And somewhere not far from them, I caught a glimpse of Edwin's face.
str_75D880A8: I think I better go join my friends.
str_EFC4F286: Yes. We'll see each other again.
str_4E91DDEB: As I made my way through the crowd toward the others, I felt strange.
str_0C2060E5: Probably the cocktail was too strong, because my surroundings were spinning me around in a colorful whirlwind.
str_B67FD6DE: How long is this going to go on? I don't understand how someone can be such a bastard!
str_67B39E63: I'll remember your cute little eyes.
